===============================================
AUTO SLIDESHOW CREATOR - UNINSTALLATION
===============================================

To remove the Auto Slideshow Creator extension, follow the
instructions for your operating system below.

macOS
-----

1. Open Finder
2. Press Cmd+Shift+G (Go to Folder)
3. Enter: ~/Library/Application Support/Adobe/CEP/extensions
4. Delete the "AutoSlideshow" folder
5. Restart Premiere Pro

Optional - Remove debug mode setting:
  Open Terminal and run:
    defaults delete com.adobe.CSXS.11 PlayerDebugMode
    defaults delete com.adobe.CSXS.12 PlayerDebugMode

Windows
-------

1. Open File Explorer
2. In the address bar, type: %APPDATA%\Adobe\CEP\extensions
3. Press Enter
4. Delete the "AutoSlideshow" folder
5. Restart Premiere Pro

Optional - Remove debug mode registry keys:
  1. Press Win+R, type "regedit", press Enter
  2. Navigate to: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Adobe\CSXS.11
  3. Delete the "PlayerDebugMode" value (if present)
  4. Navigate to: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Adobe\CSXS.12
  5. Delete the "PlayerDebugMode" value (if present)

Note: The PlayerDebugMode setting is used by other unsigned
extensions too. Only remove it if you don't use any other
third-party CEP extensions.

===============================================
